div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Basic` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Basic`. Element `Basic` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.code`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.subject` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.subject`, but has no comparisons.

Note that the source element matches Basic element path ``, but the definitions are not compatible (source: `dateTime`:0..1 -> basic: `date`:0..1). Element `Basic.created` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.created`, but has no comparisons.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Basic.author` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Basic.author` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.author`, but has no comparisons.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

comment.value: FHIR R5 Resource `Basic` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Basic`. Element `Basic` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.code`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Basic.subject` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.subject`, but has no comparisons.

Note that the source element matches Basic element path ``, but the definitions are not compatible (source: `dateTime`:0..1 -> basic: `date`:0..1). Element `Basic.created` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.created`, but has no comparisons.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Basic.author` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Basic.author` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Basic.author`, but has no comparisons.
